feat: Complete v1.0.0 release preparation

Major Features:
- Three-score system (Inference, Training, Fine-tuning)
- 107 models in database with 5 quantization options each
- Community recommendations feature (Trending/Top Rated/For Your System)
- Smart hardware detection (NVMe, multi-drive support)
- GPU upgrade suggestions with tier detection
- Reference system transparency

Repository Improvements:
- Professional README with feature highlights
- GitHub issue/PR templates
- CI/CD workflow for multi-platform testing
- Code of Conduct (Contributor Covenant 2.1)
- Security policy with responsible disclosure
- Contributor recognition system
- Comprehensive CHANGELOG
- Enhanced .gitignore for privacy

fix: Version 1.0.1 - Bug fixes and improvements

Fixed Issues:
- Training capability now shows helpful context instead of "not recommended"
- Model download buttons now functional (opens Ollama/HuggingFace in browser)
- Enhanced NVMe detection with model name checking
- Added OllamaUrl and HuggingFaceUrl properties to ModelInfo

Changes:
- Training messages now explain VRAM requirements
- Browse All Models button opens Ollama library
- Improved storage detection logging
- Better user guidance throughout the app

Addresses user feedback from screenshot review.
